title: A Conundrum
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss the fallout between Donovan Mitchell and Rudy Gobert, why they would take Giannis over everybody else in the NBA, and their thoughts on the suspension to DeAndre Hopkins, all that and more. Let's get it!
